inn1.comm: The first ball of the final is around 128 kmph; it's a length delivery holding its line outside off and Rahul Dravid allows it to pass him
Crack! Short and a tad wide, Dravid is on the front foot, shifts his balance back and cuts it to the point boundary
closer to the off stump, fuller, on a length, Dravid covers his off stump before shouldering his arms

that front leg is pressed far across, as he tends to early on in his innings, Kula tries to get an lbw with a full delivery on the middle but Dravid quickly arrests the foot movement, gets the bat around the pad to flick it past square-leg
And again. That front foot moves almost outside off and he is cramped as this ball comes in but he gets an inside edge on to his pad
straightens outside off, cut away to backward point
Shot! It was just short of length and not all that far away from the off stump, Tendulkar stands up tall to punch it sweetly to the left of Jayasuriya at mid-off
around the off stump, pushed towards short extra-cover region, Dravid sets off for a run, Tendulkar responds but Dravid asks him to get back as he sees Kapugedera swoop on the ball
length delivery moving towards the off stump, squeezed out to covers
that effort to get the lbw again; on the middle, Dravid holds his balance on the front foot and flicks it to deep backward square-leg
gets right behind the line and defends it with a straight bat.
angling away from short of length, Tendulkar waits on the back foot, opens the bat-face to steer it down to third man
length delivery holding its line outside off, Tendulkar is caught at the crease, just opens the bat-face to run it down to third man for a single
stretches across, thinks about driving on the up before letting it go through to Sangakkara
outside off stump, straightening, steered to left of backward point where the ever-alert Dilshan runs quickly to make a lunging stop
this one comes in from outside off, Dravid stabs it to his pad and it bobs up but drops safely in front of him
length delivery just outside off stump, defended to the off side
cuts in to the off stump, no room whatsoever, and Dravid pushes it back down the pitch.
on a length around the off stump line, pushed out to the off side
Very skillful! It was angling away outside off stump but Tendulkar used the short of length to wrist it to right of mid-on.
bouncing outside off stump, Dravid wanted to cut it down to third man but ended up chopping it behind the wicket. One slip in place.
141.3 kmph length delivery moving across Dravid who guides it to backward point
slower one, around 120 kmph, fullish on the middle and leg, flicked to square-leg
139.9 kmph length delivery, probing on that off-stump line, defended to point
back of length, bit of width outside off, Tendulkar punches it but can't pierce the off-side field
length delivery on the off stump, no room and Tendulkar pushes it towards mid-off
And again, that nagging line and length continues, impressive stuff from the seamers, defended to the off side
stays back to punch it to left of short extra  cover where Mahela just stretches his left hand out to nonchalantly pouch that ball
tries the slower one outside off, Tendulkar picks it early, waits before getting on that front foot and creams it past Mahela to ping the cover boundary
lovely delivery to beat Tendulkar outside off. It held its line after landing short of length and Tendulkar punched inside the line.
rotates the strike with a little dab shot down to third man
leans forward to work this to midwicket
tilting in towards middle and leg, clipped to long leg
Bang! The bouncer arrives and Dravid gets on top of that to pull it superbly to the square-leg boundary. "Brilliant," coos Bishop on air
leans forward to work it to the on side
around 136 kmph back-of-length delivery outside off, Tendulkar goes too hard into his cut shot and fails to connect.
stretches well forward, is forced to wait by the slower delivery and he taps it to the on side
another 127 kmph back of length delivery outside off, Dravid is early into the punchy drive and edges it to the on side
Classy! Slightly fuller and that's enough for Tendulkar to stretch forward and cream it through covers. Head over the ball and all that jazz.
leans forward to push to one of the two men in the short-cover region
And what does Tendulkar do ? He picks the ball from the off stump line and whips it superbly through midwicket...
similar delivery, Tendulkar's bat face shuts a bit and the ball rolls to mid-on
edged through the vacant slip region. Short of length delivery around the off stump and Tendulkar tries to punch it through extra cover/wide mid-off but gets a fat edge
from round the stumps, full in length and on the middle and leg, Tendulkar's  eyes lit up and he tries to whip it through the on side but gets a leading edge to extra cover
short in length outside off, cut past point
moving into Tendulkar who tucks it to square-leg. He would feel he has missed out on the last two deliveries. On a good day, he would whipped em past that fielder
gets forward to drive to Jayasuriya at mid-off
Top shot! Marginally short of length, on the off stump, but Tendulkar stands tall to punch it deliciously through covers.
gets forward to defend a length delivery
slower one, around 116 kmph, cutting into off and middle, Dravid adjusts by rolling his wrists over the ball and tapping it to the on side
fuller, on the off stump line, Dravid goes for the big drive and edges it to his pad. That's how he got out in the last game. There was a bigger bat and pad gap last time
gets forward to push it to towards Jayasuriya at mid-off and they run with the shot...
homing in on the off stump, not quite there for the cut but Tendulkar tries to and ends up jabbing it away to the off side ..
Two short covers still in place and one of them, Mahela, stops this defensive push from Tendulkar
on the middle stump line, turned to right of square-leg for a single
slower one, full and around the off stump, Tendulkar waits on the front foot and pushes it to left of mid-off
no slip but a gully in place and Dravid steers it past that fielder for a single. 50 partnership up. 50 from 57 balls.
another slower one, around 122 kmph, full delivery outside off,, Tendulkar is made to wait and he does before squeezing it past backward point
slightly short in length, moving across Dravid who cuts it down to third man
back of length, moving towards off stump, punched off the back foot to point
cutting in towards off stump, guided to backward point
leans across to drive through the off-side and well to the right of sweeper cover and there is an over throw as well
full in length, on the off stump line, driven crisply back to the bowler who makes a half-stop
on the off stump line, slightly slower, pushed to the left of the bowler
fullish, on the off stump line, driven uppishly past the bowler and to Jayasuriya at mid-off
loverly delivery ... almost gets the edge . It was a length delivery shaping away .. well straightening outside off and Tendulkar pushes inside the line ..
short and cut away strongly, and he gets two despite the presence of sweeper-cover - it's placed well
slower ball, way outside off, and Dravid can't reach it
strange but true, Dilshan has dropped him; it is cut hard and slightly to his left at point, easy by Dilshan's standards - but it just hit him hard and out it went
length ball, gets on to the front foot, and drives it towards cover
fullish, just short of driving length, played down to mid-off
slower ball, short and wide, and an easy single down to third man
short and wide, stays low, Tendulkar goes back and deliberately cuts it in front of square, wide of sweeper-cover, getting an easy couple
short, and nips back into Dravid, who defends it and the ball almost bounces onto the stumps
slower ball, picked early, and absolutely drilled back down the ground - Kula does well to get a hand to it and save three runs. The harsher ones among you might even call it a dropped catch
short but not wide enough to be cut, hence the bottom part of the bat on the attempted cut
stays short, gets it to nip back in, Tendulkar stands tall and punches it to sweeper-cover
slower ball, Dravid gets onto the front foot, covers his stumps and looks to run it down but doesn't get enough room
short still, stays low, and Dravid cuts it one bounce to Dilshan at point
just around the off stump, pushed away to the offside
Dazzling. Slightly short in length around the off stump, Tendulkar glides forward to punch it on the up and through covers
straighter and Tendulkar whips it to deep backward square-leg
140.1 kmph back-of-length delivery and Tendulkar again punches on the up to right of sweeper cover

shuffles across to tap the ball close on the leg side and calls Dravid for a quick single. Kandamby and Malinga converge on the ball and Dravid almost collides with Malinga, stops.. goes around Malinga and makes his crease in time
140.3 length delivery skidding on towards the middle stump, keep a bit low, Dravid crouches to keep it out
One slip in place, flighted full around off, driven to long-off for a single
around the off stump, quicker, defended on the front foot
length delivery on the off stump, pushed away to left of the bowler. Dravid signals for new gloves
the carrom ball, breaking away towards off and middle, Dravid goes back, adjusts to the movement and defends to the off side
drops it slightly short, Rahul rocks back to cut it to sweeper cover region for a single
on the off and middle, tilting in, defended back to the bowler
full and outside off stump, Dravid bends his back knee and square-drives it to sweeper region
slower one just outside off stump, Tendulkar is early into the square drive and slices it in the air but short of the diving Dilshan at point
another change of pace, around 124 kmph full and on the middle, Tendulkar waits for the ball to arrive before whipping it past square-leg
142.1 kmph full delivery on the middle, Dravid rotates the strike with a push to the left of mid-on
141.5 kmph back of length delivery just outside off stump, Tendulkar goes on the back foot to dab it down to third man
bangs in a bouncer, chest-high, Dravid swivels to pull it to deep backward square-leg fielder. Free hit coming up. Tendulkar on strike.
slips in a slower one full and outside off, Tendulkar backs away a bit and slices it in the air over covers and gets to his 92nd ODI fifty.
just outside off stump, pushed to left of cover

Twhack! It was the googly and Dravid read it early and swung it high towards long-on. Upul Tharanga catches it just in front of the ropes but back-pedals and falls over the boundary. He tries to throw the ball back in but it lobs over the ropes!
leans across to defend to cover
short in length, cut through cover point
leans forward to wrist it through wide midwicket region and will pick up two more runs
hangs on the back foot, opens the bat-face at the last minute to run it past short third man for couple more runs
flighted outside off stump, driven to short extra cover

Jayasuriya strikes. He slowed up the pace on this one, floated it outside off, making Dravid stretch across to reach for it. Dravid ended up lunging and chips it straight to short extra cover. Clever little change of pace from Jayasuriya. Dravid is angry with himself; bangs his bat against his pad as he walks away ...
leans forward to steer the flighted delivery to point .. Jayasuriya doesn't collect the throw and gives away a single
beaten outside off stump. It was flighted around off and middle and broke away, Tendulkar was pushing inside the line
pretty full in length, around off stump, driven to sweeper cover
skips down the track, the bowler shortens the length and Dhoni is hit on the pad outside off stump. Fine over from Jayasuriya.
slips his first delivery on the middle and leg line, clipped to deep midwicket
full in length, on the off and middle, pushed out to cover
goes for the drive and it runs off the inner half of the bat past square-leg
slower one, off cutter, eased down to long-on
walks down the track, pushes it back to Matthews who threatens to throw back at the stumps but holds on to the ball
fullish, on the off stump line, driven to cover
outside off stump, Tendulkar goes on the back foot ,dabs it to short third man where Kula fumbles
drifting in full to the middle and leg line, pushed to the on side
gets forward to drive to long-off
short in length, outside off stump, cut down to sweeper cover
leans forward, opens the bat-face to wrist it, partly steered, partly edged, to third man
moves down the track and works it to the on side for a single
full in length around the off stump, driven to left of mid-off
fullish outside off stump, driven to short extra cover
just outside off stump, steered to backward point
Tendulkar is standing outside the crease for Mathews. And he flicks the full delivery past square-leg
hint of inswing there .. moves in to the middle and off, driven past the bowler
on the leg and middle line, whipped to deep midwicket
moves down the track to push it towards long-off
moves outside leg stump and drives it inside-out to left of Kandamby at sweeper cover
works this one to the midwicket region for a single
on the middle and leg line, driven towards long-on
Tendulkar now pings the vacant spaces on the leg side to collect a single
And so Jayasuriya pushes this outside off, Dhoni forces it to sweeper cover
lifting deliver outside off stump, Dhoni hops to steer it to third man
slower off cutter, outside off, Tendulkar guides it to down to third man
on the middle stump line, length delivery, punched away to long-on. The singles are coming very easily.
130.1 kmph length delivery outside off stump, defended to point
Tendulkar reaches outside off stump and paddles it to backward square-leg
low full toss, dipping on Dhoni who eases it to long-on
turned to midwicket, thinks about second but the deep midwicket fielder rushes in
leans forward to push it toward deep midwicket
makes room for himself, picks it from leg stump line and lifts it over extra  cover
Crash! short and wide, dhoni upper cuts it in the air to ping the backward point boundary
cuts this to third man for a single
on the middle stump line, clipped to deep backward square-leg
Sharp bouncer, head-high and Tendulkar jumps, takes the bottom-hand off the handle and keeps it down to square-leg
short delivery, pulled to deep square-leg

backs away the leg side, tries to lift it inside-out over extra cover but misses it completely. He had dragged his foot outside the crease but got back in time  before Sanga broke the stumps. The stumping appeal was referred to third umpire. Not out is the verdict.
skids outside off stump, Tendulkar tries to open the bat-face and push it to cover point but fails to connect
gets forward to deflect it to unmanned midwicket and before Jayasuriya could get to the ball and throw, Tendulkar makes it back in time
goes on the back foot to punch it to long-off. 50 partnership

Stumping appeal and it goes upstairs.  Dhoni had stretched out to off drive, misses the ball and drags his back foot outside the crease but again, like Sachin, he retreats back in time. Good work from Sanga and quick work from Dhoni also.
on the middle, retains the strike with a push down to long-on
moves on the back foot to clip it towards deep midwicket
just short in length, punched to sweeper cover
stretches forward to push it to cover
floated outside off stump, Dhoni continues with the risk-free cricket with yet another push-drive ... this time to deep cover
drifts to the leg stump line and Tendulkar paddles it away to the fine-leg boundary. Easily done. Neat.
picks the carrom ball from the off and middle line and works it through wide midwicket
gets forward to ease it to long-off
tapped to the on side for yet another run. They are dealing in singles here.
Another little dab shot, another single to the on side ... Easy as easy gets
And this time, Tendulkar opens the bat-face to push it past cover
Dhoni tries to do the same but hits it straight to cover
nudged to right of backward point and they rush across for the single
stays adjacent to the line of a delivery on the middle and off, punches it to cover
tilts in to the middle, again stays outside the line and again, punches it to cover
lands on the leg and middle, whooshes towards middle, Dhoni gets a leading edge to cover point
lands on the leg line and drifts down leg, Tendulkar shuffles in to collect a wide
Wallop. Tendulkar, who was playing the little deflections so far, charges out to surprise Mendis and crashes it over extra cover

this time the bowler gets his own back. Tendulkar chips down the track again but Mendis gets it to dip on him rapidly and Tendulkar ends up chipping it off the inner half of the bat and the ball is in the air but clear of midwicket fielder
leans forward to push it away for a single.
hands the strike back to SRT with a push-drive towards long-on
goes right back to work the ball from the middle past square-leg
moves forward to whip it well to the right of Kapugedera at long-on
turn there! The flight lured Dhoni forward before it dipped and spun away sharply, past the lunging Dhoni
fuller, around the off stump, driven to long-off
lovely arm-ball, skidding on towards the middle, towards the pad, but Tendulkar adjusts quickly to get the bat in and pushes it to the off side
gest on the back foot to work it to right of midwicket
leans forward to pick a delivery from off and middle and tap it behind square-leg
moves forward to push it to covers
skids on straight on the middle, defended on the front foot
again on the middle, straight one, pushed back to the bowler
on the off stump line, worked away to the off side
goes back to clip it from outside off to left of deep midwicket. Very well placed .. all done without breaking into a sweat
flighted around the off stump, squeezed to short third man
tossed up, slower through the air, the risk-free batting continues; Tendulkar eases it through covers
beaten in the flight, Dhoni was caught in the crease, lunges out in the end and gets the edge on the drive and the ball rolls to backward point
drops this short, cut away to sweeper cover
moves right back to nurdle it to square-leg for a single and retains the strike
leans forward to turn it to midwicket. On 98.
lands on the middle, cuts away to middle and off, moves to 99 with a firm push to long-off
short in length, forced off the back foot past the bowler and to long-off again
stays back to punch to covers

the carrom ball outside off and that will do for Tendulkar who cuts it to sweeper cover. The arms are held aloft, he looks up to the skies, the helmet comes off and Dhoni gets across to congratulate. He has scored nine international centuries since May 2007, and has been dismissed seven times in the 90s. Going by his form 100 international hundreds can't be ruled out.
leans forward to drive to the off side
moves forward to push it to covers
stretches forward to pick a single with a wristy dab to midwicket
flighted on the middle and leg, slower through the air, Dhoni waits on the front foot before easing it to long-on
tries to work his on-side single again to a ball that lands outside off and ends up jabbing it towards non-striker
stretches across to defend to cover
just outside off, steered to point
starts the powerplay with er .. some power play. He waited on the back foot to force it on the up through extra cover

bouncing from short of length around off, pushed down towards cover and he rushes across for a quick single .. Dilshan has a shy but misses the stumps. It would have been touch and go but I think dhoni would have just made it
walks across the stumps, Malinga slings it wider outside off, Tendulkar tries to steer it to third man, misses, the bat hits the ground and the ball goes to Sanga who doesn't collect cleanly ..
Malinga continues to bleed. He had given away 27 runs in his first three overs. Dhoni reaches his fifty with a fine back-foot punchy cut to point boundary
overpitched outside off stump, lifted well to the right of Dilshan at sweeper cover
leans forward to push-drive to cover
flights it outside off, guided to wide of point for one
another regulation offbreak, placed into the covers
flighted again, this time on the leg stump, paddles away but can't beat short fine
looks to come out of the crease, sees a short delivery, and turns it to deep square leg for one
short and down the leg side, Dhoni can't make contact
yorks him in the leg stump, played back to the bowler
goes for the big hit down the ground, mis-hits, but it lands safe and he gets one down to long-on
short ball, cramping him up, but they manage a quick single to mid-on
wide way outside off, his arm came down early in this delivery
gets a bottom edge on a widish delivery, beats the stumps and the keeper
is late into the pull shot, this short delivery climbs into him and cramps him fast, the top edge lobs to midwicket - good hand played by Dhoni
138.2 kmph lifting delivery on the off stump line, Tendulkar hops to push it down to the off side
lovely acrobatic effort from Sanga who dives to his left to stop the wide from running away to the fine-leg boundary
slings a full one across, around off stump line, pushed out to covers
edges the off drive towards mid-on and rushes for a single to retain the strike;' it would have been really tight run had Kulaserkara picked the ball up ...
flighted on the middle and off, worked to midwicket
gets forward to deflect it towards midwicket and again takes a risky single. Had Matthew's throw hit the stumps, it could have got really interesting.
shout for lbw as the carrom ball cuts in to the middle and off line, Yuvraj lunges across to defend and gets the inside edge
off break this time, turned right of deep midwicket for two more runs. Precise placement. This has been a masterclass in risk-free cricket
another little off break, Tendulkar goes right back to tap it past square-leg
stretches out to stab it of the inner edge to square-leg
yorker length outside off stump, Yuvraj stumbles, pushes his bat out but no wood on leather
full pitched , well outside off, reaches out to squeeze it past point
full pitched on the off stump line, pushed out through covers
on the off stump line, bunted out to cover point
walks across, reaches out to a full delivery well outside off, opens the bat-face to calmly guide it wide of third man for couple more runs.
again, walks across the sticks to push a full delivery to cover
leans forward to defend to the off side
yorker on the middle stump line, dug out to the off side and they cross over
super yorker just outside off, squeezes under the bat, misses the off stump and Sanga lunges to his left to take it
slower one, length delivery outside off, dabbed to third man and Tendulkar does the calling! and Dravid gets across
wide down the leg side, Sanga makes a diving half-stop
Another wide .. Sanga is not too happy .. dives to collect and immediately, says a few words to the bowler
length delivery on the off and middle, mistimes the drive back to the bowler
full pitched around off stump, Tendulkar drives to long-off... Tendulkar says, wait wait! and as he sees that cover fielder can't cut it off, he allows them to run the single!
short in length, on the stumps, worked to the on side
stays back to punch it to cover
a sharp bouncer and Yuvraj yanks his head away from the line
yorker length, squeezed out to the off side
slower one outside off stump, dabbed to the off side
forced away through covers for couple of runs
full in length outside off stump, driven to right of sweeper cover
short in length and well wide outside off stump, tendulkar can't reach it.
yorker just outside off, Tendulkar tries to dig it out but no wood on leather
shuffles across and whips a full delivery from outside off to deep midwicket
yet another yorker - fine bowling this - outside off, Yuvraj can't get bat to ball
Thump! A length delivery this time and Yuvraj pounces on it in style. He swung through the line and the white ball flew over long-on
a slower one, dabbed down to third man
full pitched on the off and middle, pushed down to long-off
slower one around the off stump, Tendulkar glides it to third man
drifts down the leg side, Yuvraj tries to flick, can't connect and Sanga backs up
Sweet! It was full pitched delivery on the middle and off, Yuvraj leaned forward to time it superbly past the bowler and to the straight boundary.
wider outside off, full again, slashed away to deep point region where Mahela makes a fine diving stop
the slower one, on the middle, tucked to backward square-leg
bouncer on the middle and leg line, Tendulkar fends it away to the on side and says one one (or was it run run)
the off break, short in length, Tendulkar shapes to pull but withdraws from the shot as the sees the ball turn away down leg side... And Tendulkar keeps directing his runner (Dravid) !!
short again, swatted to deep midwicket region
leans forward to push it to mid-on
loopy delivery around the off stump and breaks away, left alone
plays the late cut to a similar delivery this time and Malinga rushes to his right from short third man
leans forward to drive through the off side
floated full outside off, driven to deep cover
just short of length, cut down to third man
short in length outside off stump, cut wide of deep backward point and again, its Tendulkar who does the calling .. "Do do (two two)!" What a guy!
yorker length outside off stump, tries to slash it away but cant connect
yorker length on the off stump line, driven to mid-off and Tendulkar screams some instructions!
fires across a bouncer outside off, Tendulkar goes for the pull but can't connect again.. And he is some pain as he swivels around ...
lovely sharp yorker, Tendulkar is in a tangle, tries to squeeze it out and is hit on the boot .. just outside leg stump, though
off break on the middle and off and Yuvraj plays it very cautiously to the off side!
sweeps from the middle and hands the strike back to Sachin. Let's see whether he goes for the big shots now
Bang! And he does. He charges out, making room by going outside the leg stump, and crashes it over extra-cover. That was a flat hit. The ball lands on the ropes.
aha! the reverse sweep now. He picked the carrom ball from the off stump and swung it over backward point
Oh boy he is enjoying himself with his innovations now. Another reverse sweep. He goes down on his back knee and brings his highest score against Sri Lanka with a reverse sweep past backward point
goes for another reverse sweep, misses and this time it's the off break that traps him right in front. What an innings though. Absolute masterclass on risk-free cricket.
from round the stumps, well outside the off stump... reaches out to mistime the shot to the off side
fuller, again outside off stump, Yuvraj doesn't connect with his intended slice
low dipping full toss from round the stumps, driven to long-on

He is gone! He backed away, Thushara fired it almost yorker length outside off and Yusuf reached out and ended up slicing it straight to backward point. Yusuf stays there as he thinks he hit straight to the ground. Replays show that the ball went straight up in the air after making contact with the bat ..   the bat hit the ground .... Gone! The third umpire conveys his decision to Doctrove who says Yusuf you got to go
stays round the stumps, fires in a yorker outside off, Raina tries to squeeze it to third man but doesn't connect

this time its just short of yorker length, again outside off from that round the stumps angle, and Raina crouches to deflect it to right of third man where Malinga dives with his right foot stretched out but can't prevent the ball from running away from him
Fab shot. He picked the slower one early and lifted it high over covers
yorker length, tries to whip it to the on side and edges it to third man where Jayasuriya fumbles to give away an extra run
that yorker-length, tad wide outside off, Yuvraj can't put bat to ball
Whiplash! It was the low full toss on the leg and middle and Yuvraj whips it away .. whooshes away to the deep square-leg boundary
pushes it further outside off and ends up bowling a wide
full pitched on the off stump line, Yuvraj drags it, heaves it towards wide midwicket boundary
slower one, short in length, bounces down leg side, Raina gets inside the line and allows it to go past him
slings across a full delivery just outside leg, shoveled away to square-leg
139.5 kmph yorker from round the stumps, runs off the inner edge to deep square-leg region
fullish, around that off stump, bunted out to the on side for a single that brings up 300
moves forward, back and then forward again and Thushara pushes it wide outside off stump and Sanga too doesn't collect it cleanly
Raina holes out to long-off. He went for the big hit and gained more elevation than distance. It went really high and Kula did well to stay under it and take it
lashed away! full toss just outside off, Yuvraj flashes it to the point boundary
yorker length on the middle and off, dug out to backward point
pretty full in length, driven to long-off where Jayasuriya makes the stop. The chase should be interesting with Sanath and Dilshan having a go.
overpitched around off, driven hard but straight to long-off. Yuvi comes on strike
goes for the big big slog swing but is beaten by the slower one
full pitched well outside off, within the wide line but .. Yuvraj let it go .. perhaps he thought it might be wider but it wasn't

Cheeky! He went down on his knee, initially looking to paddle sweep and as soon as he saw it was outside off, he just deflected it over the vacant slip cordon. Neat flick of the wrist. He pumps his fist furiously to celebrate his fifty
heaves through the on side for couple of runs
Bosh! Full and outside off, lashed away to the cover boundary.

inn2.comm: 128.7 kmph length delivery straightening on the middle stump line, pushed out to wards mid-off ... Yuvraj swoops on the ball and flicks a direct hit but Jayasuriya is just home. They had asked for the third umpire who rules it not out
length delivery moving towards off stump line, defended to cover
again, straightening on the middle and off line, Dilshan pushes outside the line and edges it to square-leg
135.3 fuller delivery, shapes away from the off stump, Jayasuriya stretches across to nudge it towards cover
full in length, outside off stump, pushed away towards mid-off.
full in length, in the zone outside off stump, left alone
bouncing off a short of length around off, punched away to cover
cuts in from outside off, cramps up Dilshan who edges it to his pad
kicks up back of length, again tilts in towards off stump, Dilshan mistimes the punchy stroke to the off side
Wham! Marginal width and Dilshan cracks it on the up and through cover point in style
oh even more expansive shot. Short and wide, Dilshan cuts it over backward point. he is up and running.
fuller length, flashed away to Harbhajan at third man
full in length, on that middle stump - Nehra is trying his best not to give any room to Dilshan - pushed back to him
just outside off stump, Dilshan stays beside the line and punches it on the up but can't beat cover
Whooshed away! Well outside off stump and Dilshan frees his arms. He got on to the front foot and fisted it away through point, past the diving Virat Kohli
closer to the off stump, bouncing, pushed to mid-off
length delivery angling away from Dilshan who plays a punchy drive to left of Yuvraj at mid-off
gets forward to stab it off the inner edge to backward square-leg
high bouncer that climbs over Jayasuriya who ducks
length delivery holding its line on the off stump line, pushed to left of mid-off for a quick single.
kicks up from back of length outside off, Dilshan was shaping to punch it but pulls away from the shot after seeing the extra bounce
Slasher Dilshan! short and slightly wide outside off, Dilshan lifts it deliberately over backward point
Violent thump! Whaddaplayaaa! He pressed on the front foot and crashed the length delivery on the up and through extra cover
The pressure ... the pressure is showing ... Ishant tries a slower one - the back of the hand thingy - but slips it way wide outside off stump
oh lovely .. it kicked up from short of length, there was some extra bounce but Dilshan adjusted to it really well and cut it away to deep point region where Harbhajan mops up
short in length, moving in to the middle and off line, turned to midwicket
Wallop. Jayasuriya walked down the track towards the off side, Nehra quickly shortened the length but Jayasuriya whacked it over mid-off
short in length outside off stump, pushed away to point
picks the full delivery from almost outside off and bunted it through midwicket.
short cover and short midwicket in now and Jayasuria defends compactly to the off side
allows the ball to come to him before tucking it past square-leg
Imperious! He walked towards the off side, picked a back-of-length delivery from outside off and swung it over wide midwicket region.
threatens to jump out, RP fires it short and Jayasuriya hops to guide it to backward point.
fuller in length, moves in towards off stump, Jayasuriya check-drives it to the off side

dropped by Virat Kohli at backward point. What a miss! A sitter too. Tension and pressure I tell you can make you err. It was short in length and Jayasuriya was cramped up and chopped it straight to Kohli who clanged it!
And guess what, yep, the next delivery disappears to the boundary. It drifted towards the body and Sanath short-arm pulls it past the short fine-leg fielder.
What immense fun. Exciting chase on. Jayasuriya glides forward and thrashes it on the up and through extra cover.
134.5 kmph length delivery and moving across Dilshan who tries to play a cute dab to cover point for a single and misses it completely
Crash! The fifty is up. It was slightly short in length and Dilshan pulls it over midwicket.
And ladies and gentlemen, the paddle scoop aka Dilscoop is out. The crowd roar! It was short in length, bouncing on the off stump line, Dilshan went down on his knee and scooped it over Dhoni!
slightly slower one - iirc the first change of pace by the Indians- around 124 kmph, it bounces up outside off and Dilshan pulls out of the shot
short in length and angling outside off, Dilshan flashes it through the vacant slip region. The white ball is flying everywhere much to the delight of the home crowd
on the pads, tucked to fine leg for a single
slip and backward short leg in place as Dilshan goes right back to defend to the off side. No long-off and no long-on
gets forward to defend the off break. Attacking field set by Dhoni. will Dishan take up the challenge.
stays on the back foot to turn it to midwicket
drops it short , perhaps he thought Dilshan would jump out, but the batsman stayed back to cut it to the point boundary. Game on.

Harbhajan roars and he is mobbed by his team-mates. With a scrambled seam, he landed it on a length on the middle and off and it skidded on to the middle. Dilshan misread the length, went back to cut and in the end, tried to stab it away to the off side but misses. Timber! What a fun start he has given to the chase, though. A huge wicket for India. Drama continues in Lanka. Dhoni was ecstatic there. He roared and roared.
flighted up outside off stump, pushed to mid-on
shuffles across, tries to short-arm pull a short delivery, misses and it rolls off the pad
tucked to the on side for a single.
full delivery, on the middle stump line, turned to the on side
full pitched around the off stump, driven to the mid-off region
tries the slower one, full and drifting to middle and leg, swung down to Ishant at fine-leg
short in length, just outside off stump, dabbed to Kohli at backward point. Kohli must be still tensed after dropping that sitter off Jayasuriya
slip and backward short leg watch as Jayasuriya steps out to lift it over Harbhajan and it runs away to the straight boundary.
from round the stumps, around the leg stump line, Jayasuriya goes for the sweep and it runs between Dhoni and backward short leg
goes down on his knee to sweep it to left of Karthik at deep square-leg. Karthik runs all the way to move into short-leg position now!

Harbhajan has struck again! What a gem of a spell this is turning out to be. Again scrambled seam, applies some over spin on the doosra on the off stump line, Mahela is lured into a waft to the on side and gets a leading edge back down the pitch. Harbhajan screams in delight; his team-mates too clear their throats.
on the middle stump line, floater, Sanga pushes at it tentatively and edges it through backward square-leg
flighted across, full, Sangakkara doesn't quite get forward, lunges out at the last minute to place it wide of midwicket for a single
leans across to square drive to point for a single
strides forward to pick up the flighted delivery and lifts it to the long-on boundary.. so much depends on Sanath.
goes for the sweep, misses, rolls away to the on side, Sanga wants a run but is sent back and gets in time to beat the throw from Yuvraj
again, doesn't connect well with the sweep.
on the leg stump line, edges the sweep to Yuvraj at short fine-leg
drifts down the leg side, wide called. Deep midwicket and deep backward square-leg in

The big man is gone. The off spinners are doing it for India. In style. Jayasuriya tries to swing the flighted delivery from outside off to the leg side but is beaten in flight and top-edges it to mid-on. It triggers off the Indian celebration routine: Scream in joy
turned to the on side for a single
rolls off the pad for a single
goes to the leg side for one more run.
gets forward to drive to RP at long-on
slips down leg and Dhoni collects the wide
just outside off stump, nudged to backward square-leg
topspinner on the middle stump, bouncing, Thushara edges it to the on side
flighted on the off stump line, driven to long-off
quicker one, skids on towards the off stump, pushed to the off side.
short in length, outside off stump and Thushara slashes it over backward point
flighted on the middle, driven hard to Harbhajan at mid-off
Thwack. He took a step forward and lofted it to the long-off boundary. 100 up for Sri Lanka
on the middle and off line, pushed to covers
on the middle stump line, hands the strike back to the pinch hitter with a nudge to midwicket
turns in from outside leg, dabbed away to the on side
flighted outside leg stump, Thushara sweeps it hard to deep backward square-leg boundary
over spin on this one, on the middle, stabbed away to the off
gets forward to lift it to right of long-on for couple of runs
lands outside leg, turns in, evades the sweep and hits the body
full in length, on the middle and off and Sangakkara defends to the off side
on the pads, tucked away to Nehra at fine-leg

Ishant, who leaked runs with the newer ball, tastes his first success. It landed back of length on the middle and leg and straightened to go past the attempted across-the-line slog and crash into the middle stump. Four down and wobbling.
135.5 kmph lifting delivery outside off stump, Matthews sways away.
short in length around the off stump, steered to backward point
Wow! A stunning straight six. After being bounced at, couple of balls earlier, he moved down the track and thumped through the line of the delivery. Up and over she flew.
leans forward to work it through the vacant midwicket and by the time the men came in from the deep he picks two runs. This is how Sachin played in his innings.
on the leg stump line, swept away to Karthik at deep backward square-leg for a single.
flighted outside off stump, square driven to the off side. That was well tossed up
again well tossed up, shoveled uppishly towards mid-on
just outside off stump, chopped to backward point
stretches across to the off side, Harbhajan pushes it towards leg and middle but Angelo plays a neat little paddle shot to pick up a boundary
just outside off stump line, steered through cover point
short in length around the off stump, taps it  close on the off side and they scramble across
full pitched on the middle and off line, turned to midwicket. Ishant gives a stare and a few words at the batsman. Angelo doesn't say anything but the crowd roar!
here comes the bouncer and Angelo pulls it down to deep square-leg region
walks across towards middle and off and clips it to right of deep square leg where Karthik fumbles to give away the extra run.
floated full on the off stump, leading edge towards short mid-off region and Raina rushes in from extra cover and flicks a throw past the stumps at non-striker's end
on the middle and leg, slight turn, tucked past square-leg

Yuvraj, the man with the golden arm, strikes. It was flighted outside off stump, on a length, stops a touch on Angelo who chips it on the up and straight to Raina at extra cover. Sangakkara stands alone
gets forward to whip it to midwicket
on the off stump line, dabbed to the on side
flighted full, driven to long-on
leans forward to defend to the on side of the pitch
around the off stump line, defended to the bowler
leans across to drive through covers
wrists it from the middle stump to midwicket for a single
floated outside off, driven to Yuvraj at extra cover
lands on the off stump, spins past the edge .... and Bishop drawls, "My goodness Raina, you have blotted the copybook;' you haven't taken a wicket!"
just outside off stump, dabbed to point region
steps down the track and drives to covers where RP misfields but recovers quickly to fire in a direct hit at the non-striker's end
quicker one, skidding across Kandamby who pushes it out to point
on the middle and off, deflected to left of midwicket
takes a couple of steps down the track and eases the ball to long-on
on the middle and leg, flicked to Kohli at short fine-leg
on the off stump line, skidding on, nudged to cover point
flighted on the off stump line, square driven towards deep point
skips down the track and flicks it to left of midwicket where RP makes a lunging stop
on the off and middle again, defended to the on side
pauses just before release, floats it outside off, pushed to cover
again, pauses his action prior to the release and lands it around off stump, defended to the off side
floated outside leg stump, swept away to Dravid in the deep
paddles it to backward square-leg for a single

Dhoni misses a run out chance. It was nudged close to the leg side, Dhoni rushed after it, flung his right glove away, picked the ball, swivelled around but fired in a wild throw. Kandamby was well short of the crease
slips full down the leg side
again drifting towards the leg side, misses the sweep but the ball runs away towards fine-leg and Kohli gives chase
gets forward to defend to the off side
flighted around off stump, pushed to cover
slower, on the off, stays back to work it to point
moves to the off side, paddles it to short fine-leg
shorter, just outside off, cut away to sweeper cover
short in length, skidding outside off, punched to the bowler
slower, around off stump, pushed into the gap in covers
threatens to paddle and Raina pushes it outside off and Kandamby cuts it away to deep-point region
on the pads, clipped behind square-leg for a single
moves outside leg and drives inside-out to long-off
flighted on the middle and off line, eased through to long-on
backs away again to play a lovely cut shot to cover boundary. What stood out was the precise placement to bisect the two men in the deep
worked to the on side for a single, there is a direct hit at the striker's end but Sangakkara is home. The on-field umpire checks with third umpire just to make sure Sanga was in.
on the middle and leg, turned to short fine-leg for a quick single. Kohli charged in but threw it slightly off target

This is a even better cut than the one earlier in the over. This wasn't all that short, he arched back, created room, time and placement and cut it deftly past backward point. Ishant ran across from deep point to kick it away
leans forward to push it to the off side
again, he backs away to unfurl the cut shot

Dhoni misses the stumping  Sangakkara was dragged out of the crease by the flight and then beaten by the turn and the back foot was dragged out. But Dhoni fumbled and couldn't collect cleanly. Lovely delivery, drifting in before spinning away
defended on the front foot
shorter, goes for the pull, misses but collects the leg bye
leans forward to push to the off side
leans forward to push the length delivery towards mid-off for a single
short in length,; he likes his cuts and late cuts .. Kandamby ie. He waits for this ball to come to him before arching back to deftly cut it down to third man
walks across to the off side and clips the short-of-length delivery on the off stump line past square-leg
moves in towards off stump, again a slight shuffle across and he punches it to long-on

aha! lovely. RP fires in a bouncer on the off stump line, Kandamby stays adjacent to the line of the ball and opens the bat-face to steer it through the vacant slip region. Not quite the finesse of Ranatunga, who was a master of the steer, but pretty close.
And the bowler gets his own revenge. Another bouncer, fiery this time, takes Kandamby by surprise and he is hit on the helmet!
leans forward to defend to the off side
just outside off, cut to cover
around the off and middle line, nudged to the on side
almost a mix-up It was pushed to backward point and Sangakkara had rushed across for a single before he realises his partner is not interested but makes it back in time
on the leg stump line, Kandamby doesn't offer a shot really and it rolls of the pad to fine-leg ... the umpire gives it as runs, though.
leans forward to push it through the on side for a single
gets forward to deflect it to wide midwicket
length delivery on the off stump, mistimes the punchy drive to covers

OMG! What a bizzare way to get out. Oh dear. It''s a low full toss, below waist-high, Sangakkara has a jab at it and here is where the trouble starts. The bat slips out of his sweaty gloved hands and flips in the air back over his shoulder and falls on the stumps. What a way to go. Sanga looks stunned. Shocked.  He was looking to really fight it out there but the captain has to go. Raina tackles RP in celebration and both go down to the ground laughing. For what it's worth, the ball rolled towards mid-on after impact with the bat.
the off cutter that lands short of length, turns sharply and bounces past the off stump much to the surprise of the batsman and even the bowler
pushed across Kapu who lets it go through
moves forward to push it to point for a single
dipping delivery on the off stump, turned through the on side
around the off stump line, backs away to punch it to cover
drags it slightly shorter, pulled to midwicket
fetches the ball from outside off and sweeps it for a single
quicker one, short in length, punched away to long-on
rotates the strike with a push-drive
short in length, around off stump, pushed down to long-off
dug in short, defended to covers. Free hit coming up. The crowd come alive.
a sharp yorker on the off stump, Kandamby was moving outside the leg stump, crouched to dig it out

drama! length delivery on the middle, pushed towards mid-on .. Kapu had rushed across and is forced to turn back ...Yuvraj dives to flick a throw and Raina lunges to his right at the non-striker's end, collects the throw and back-flicks the ball towards the stumps. He misses. And he stumbles forward and falls. Meanwhile, more drama as Kapu who was getting back trips over Raina and he too is down.
almost played on! He stabbed it off the inner edge and the ball rolled past the stumps
in the zone outside off, dhoni gathers
floated in from round the stumps, squeezed off the inner half of the bat towards deep midwicket
drops it short and Kandamby goes back, opens his stance and pulls it to wide midwicket boundary

Dropped by Yusuf. What a sitter it was! The crowd roar! It was the quicker one outside off, short in length, Kandamby top edged the pull to cover. It should have been all over at this point. Yusuf waited for the ball to come down and his back foot seems to have got stuck at the last minute and he spilled the catch!
turns and bounces, Dhoni collects
leans forward to push it through for a single
flatter, defended on the front foot
back of a length, angling across him, and punched away to sweeper-cover
cruel, cruel on RP, gets a genuine edge outside off, with a length ball holding its line, but it flies way to the left of Dhoni
pinches a single, RP lets out a groan, because this was hit straight to point, where Kohli fumbled
slower offcutter, 121ks, beats Kapugedera neck and crop
again he steals a single, drops it to the left of cover and rushes through
short, rising delivery, well played by Kandamby. Lets it come to him, gets tall and runs it down to third man, plays it right under his eyes
flighted on the off stump, played back to Yuvraj
another fullish delivery on leg stump, turned away to midwicket
doesn't get to the pitch of this delivery, but gets it down to long-on for one
slows the pace down here, Kapu is early into it and then ends up checking the shot
flighted outside off, Kapu lets it go - very good over from Yuvraj, just the one run
flighted on the off stump, dabbed to point
top spin on that, bounces just outside off, dabbed to short third man
on the middle, worked to square-leg for a single

run out chance but Yuvraj doesn't pick up the ball. It was pushed close on the off side and Kandamby hesitated after taking a step. Kapu had rushed across and Kandamby had to get across. Yuvraj had charged across from point and had he picked the ball, it could have got interesting
worked past square-leg and they run hard to come back for the second
stays back to push the off break to off-side of the pitch
yorker length on the off stump, dug out to the off side
short and outside off stump, cut to deep point ... they come back for the second run .. RP is slow on the ball and the throw isn't quick enough. Dhoni is not impressed
fuller, driven through the off side and RP is quicker this time
lands on the middle and leg, moves towards middle, defended compactly back down the pitch
gets forward to push the back-of-length delivery to Harbhajan at mid-on
bouncer on the middle and Kandamby goes down under
goes for the sweep from outside off stump, they shout for lbw and is hit on the pad outside off
off break on the middle, dabbed to the on side
stretches forward to on drive the flighted delivery to long-on
stretches across to outside off and top edges the sweep to long leg... RP gets across quickly
leans forward to whip the flighted delivery from the off stump to deep midwicket. That's his fifty. A very calm assured knock this.
reaches outside off stump and whips the full delivery to midwicket where Raina makes a tumbling stop.
length delivery on the middle stump line, defended to covers

Dhoni misses a run out It was stabbed off the inner edge behind the wicket and Kandamby charged across for a nonexistent run. He scooted back. Dhoni had picked the ball and was pretty close to the stumps when he flicked the throw but missed it. Kandamby would have been easily run out. Tension. Pressure. Game on
turned off the hips for a single
length delivery on the off and middle, pushed to covers. 100 from 80 balls.
Whack. Short and wide from Ishant and Kapu flays it to the point boundary. Dhoni looks down at the ground, arms on  his hips. Ishant shuts his eyes and yanks his head up after delivering that ball.
short in length, cut away to backward point
leans forward to turn the ball from the middle to the leg side and Dhoni gets across to pick it up
from round the stumps, flighted outside off, slower through the air, dabbed to short third man
on the off stump line, quicker, ripped across, shoveled uppishly well clear of the bowler and it runs down to long-on
turns in from outside off, pushed to midwicket
skips down the track and drives to Karthik at long-on. Karthik is substituting for Sachin.
just outside off stump, topspinner, nudged to backward point
back-of-length delivery straightening on the off and middle, run down to third man
the slow yorker, around 119 kmph, squeezed off the inner edge towards short fine-leg region.

Very delicate. Very skillful. It was full in length, on the middle stump line, he stayed back, waited for the ball to arrive to him before using his wrists over time to glance it to the fine-leg boundary.
Crash bang! Short and tad wide outside off and Kapugedera rocks back to cut it superbly to the point boundary
on the middle stump line, gets forward, gets the bat in front of the pad to defend to the on side. Dhoni has a look at the score board. 84 from 67.
the slower one, bouncing delivery, cutter outside off, left alone

from round the stumps, skidder outside off, dabbed to short third man .. Nehra moves in but slips a bit as he throws ; its a weak throw and the batsman gets in without any fuss. Yuvraj screams, "Cmon!"
slower, outside off, Kapu was looking to come down, waits on the front foot before forcing it away to deep point
It was the dipping full delivery, tries to on drive, is beaten and the ball rolls off the pad well to the left of the keeper. The batsman was outside the crease but it was wide of Dhoni
slower on the middle, nudged to the on side
full toss, forced away to deep square-leg .. they are going for the second run. Kohli is on the ball but throw is well above Dhoni who has to jump, collect and flick it down but the batsman is home.
shout for lbw as Kandamby goes for the reverse sweep. Shades of Bill Athey, Gatting ..! HE missed it and was hit on the back thigh well outside the off stump
worked it through to Yusuf at deep midwicket
couple of steps down the track, Raina pushes it quicker and shorter, deflected to midwicket
moves down the track and on drives past the non striker. Raina tries to get across but collides with Kandamby!
gets forward to dab it to the off side
moves outside leg stump and Raina fires it in quickly on the leg stump and Kandamy steers to backward point
steps down the track, yet another full toss, swung away to deep midwicket
drops it short and Kapugedera pulls it to wide long-on region. Ishant rushes across to make a tumbling stop. The crowd is buzzing.
skips down the track, Yuvraj drags back the length and Kapugedera jabs it to the on side
That fetish for the reverse sweep continues. He goes for it, but misses it and is hit on the pad . He is thinking, if  i connect I would get a boundary.
moves forward to turn it through midwicket for a single
swung hard to left of midwicket where Raina makes a fine diving stop. 71 from 48. The batting powerplay yet to be taken. Game is really and truly on.
from round the stumps, sees Kandamby stepping out and hurls it quicker, cut down to sweeper cover region. 250 up.
on the middle and leg, backs away again to dab it to cover point

Huge strike by Raina. It was the quicker one, skidding outside off, Kapugedera tried to dab it late behind the wicket but edged it. It popped out of Dhoni's gloves but he caught it on the rebound. Big wicket. A fine innings from Kapu comes to an end. 68 from 45 balls needed now. This fascinating game continues to see-saw
tossed up outside off, pushed back to Raina
goes right back to work it past square-leg for a single
on the pads, coming in with the arm, tucked to right of Yuvraj at short fine-leg region
starts well with a yorker on the middle, Kandamby clears his front foot and digs it out . Dhoni shouts out words of encouragement to one and all.
goes for the yorker again, ends up as a low dipping full toss ,driven down the track, Ishant deflects it with his boot and goes across towards short midwicket to pick up the ball

length delivery on the middle and off, pushed towards short mid-off, Yuvraj comes across from extra cover and flicks a direct hit at the non-striker's end (Kandamby was outside the crease) and the ball ricochets off the stumps for an overthrow
backs away outside leg .. Ishant fires it in on the middle, wafted to right of backward point

Shot! Superbly timed. There was some width on offer outside off, Kula reached out to open the bat -face and punch it to deep backward point boundary. He didn't hit it hard, just timed it .. a firm steer
again, well outside off stump, this time time run down to right of third man. Nehra has a chat with Ishant. 58 from 36 balls.
Ah! a wide to start off the powerplay. It was down the leg side.
turned well to the right of midwicket but the calling isn't great and they both retreat to their respective position
on the off stump line, pushed out to covers

Harbhajan has done it again. He was the man who took the first two wickets and he is the man who turns the game again for India now. Kandamby moved well outside leg stump and went for the cut but missed it completely. Clatter! What a wonderful innings under pressure but he has given it away in the end. 66 valuable runs but he is gone now. Advantage India.
Double jeopardy! Done in by the doosra. Just like the Mahela dismissal. Malinga tried to turn it to the leg side for a single but all he does get is a leading edge ... a dolly back to Harbhajan.

slip and a very short cover in place for the hattrick.. Mendis sweeps it from around the off stump to fine-leg where Yusuf slips near the boundary but dives back to cut it off. What a awful night he is having...
turns to the middle and leg, worked to midwicket.
moves outside leg stump and the yorker length delivery goes under the big swing of the bat and Dhoni gathers
a slower one, around 115 kmph, full and outside off, goes past the attempted waft
120.7 short delivery, Mendis moves outside leg, tries to flat-bat it  through the off side but can't connect. Dhoni has a chat with Rahul, standing in the first slip
Mendis keeps swinging. Mendis keeps missing. Another charge towards leg but the short-of-length delivery bounces over the flashing blade
Yep. Again. It was the slower one this time, he kept his front foot outside leg, tried to slash it away but no wood on leather.
Makes meaty contact this time. For a change, he moved towards off stump this time and swung the slower one over midwicket
aha! Mendis goes for the big reverse sweep, misses and is struck on the pad; the ball had pitched outside leg stump
flighted ever so slowly outside off, pushed to extra cover
chips down the track and mistimes the lofted shot towards long-on
moves outside leg, Harbhajan slows up the pace but ends up tossing it further down leg .. Mendis tries to pull it away but misses

Fittingly, Harbhajan hammers in the final nail. A tossed up doosra, from round the stumps, lures Mendis out of the crease, turns past the swing of the bat and Dhoni does the rest. Harbhajan bags a five-for. What a game he has had. He took out Dilshan and Mahela at the top, returned at the pressure time to deliver the knock-out punch. The Indians get into a celebratory huddle.
